pkgmetadata.longdescription: parseedn is an Emacs Lisp library for parsing EDN data. It uses parseclj's shift-reduce parser internally. EDN and Emacs Lisp have some important differences that make translation from one to the other not transparent (think representing an EDN map into Elisp, or being able to differentiate between false and nil in Elisp). Because of this, parseedn takes certain decisions when parsing and transforming EDN data into Elisp data types.
